title: As an BOC Intl Ama Admin User, I no longer want Clubs to be able to trade Intl slot values
custom_preconds: AC:* Beginning October 15th (when the current signing period ends), Clubs will no longer have the ability to trade International Slot Money* When entering a new Outright (Trade), International Signing Bonus Pool will not be an available option when clicking on ‰Û÷Add Consideration‰Ûª* This will be true for the next signing period, but the subsequent signing period* Clubs will no longer be able to increase their Max Pool Amount on the Intl Signing Bonus Tracker

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Display Position on Transactions That Add Player to Active MJ Roster
custom_preconds: Wires: * [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=sign_free_agent|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=sign_free_agent]* [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=selection_to_ml_roster|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=selection_to_ml_roster]* [https://aceshn.axshare.com/#p=rule_5_selection|https://aceshn.axshare.com/#p=rule_5_selection]*AC:** Transactions that add a player to the Active MJ Rosters in-season (26-man roster, 28-man roster in September) should display the position the player is going to be added to the roster with** MJSEL** SIGNFA** R5SEL* This field should not be editable for Club User* This field should be editable for BOC Admin Users* If a BOC User updates the position, the player‰Ûªs primary position will be updated* A player optioned pre-Opening Day, then later recalled would also have it on their recall transaction (even though on the 40).  It is all about being added to the ML active roster.* This is only when the player is added to the MJ Active roster for the first time

custom_preconds: We‰Ûªve had this issue for a while.  Every time we need to add a country we need to made a code fix.   This should be controlled via database so that at the very least, we can change this with a data fix. AC:* Dropdowns should be configurable** District, Province, etc* National ID should be configurable** Format** Required?

title: As an LRD user I want the payroll report modals to only display a payroll report type if it is saved for the selected year
custom_preconds: Currently the payroll report types listed in the "As Of" parameter on the modal are hardcoded to show specific lists.  Instead, that list should be determined based on which options are saved for any given year.When a new option is added to the database and a payroll is saved on the payroll report utility, that year/type combo should be an option to choose for the following payroll reports:Payrolls - Player DetailsPayrolls - Team DetailsThe remaining payroll reports should still work the same way they currently doAC:* Payroll report modal will display only the as of options which are saved for the corresponding payroll year* New payroll options should display, if they are saved for the year selected.

title: As an LRD user I want earned performance and other bonuses to have their earned amount adjusted value calculated differently
custom_preconds: Currently the earned amount adjusted uses the games prorated value to decrease the value from the actual earned bonus amount.  Instead the agreement states that the bonus value should be prorated by using the following formula:adjusted threshold / original threshold * earned bonus amount - in general this will come out fairly close to the actual calculation, however the rounding is done on the threshold side which leads to slightly different values.When the bonus is an innings pitched bonus, it should use .333333 and .666666 for the adjusted threshold rather than .1 and .2.If a bonus has criteria which span multiple years, the adjusted earned bonus amount will be reduced based on the total # of games played by the total # of games in each season.  Since 2019 was 162 games and 2020 will be 60, a 2019-2020 bonus earned in 2020 will be adjusted by (162+60) / (162+162) = 0.68 * actual earned bonus amountIf the bonus has more than one term, then the basic adjustment will be appliedThe offered bonus adjusted amounts on the summary screen should reflect the same logic, both in the total‰Ûªs at the top and in the perf and other bonus sections below.  (this may be subject to changed based on what‰Ûªs possible, I‰Ûªll try to update appropriately)Example calc from Cameron:Collin McHugh, his first amount should be: (6/15) * $100,000 = $40,000. The only caveat to this is that on the IP bonuses, the decimals used should be .3333 and .6666 (rather than .1 and .2). For instance, on McHugh‰Ûªs first IP threshold, his earned amount should be: (11.3333/30) * $250,000 = $94,444.AC:* earned bonus amount adjusted is calculated using the ratio of adj threshold to threshold* Innings pitched uses 1/3 and 2/3 rather that .1 and .2 when making the calculation * Bonuses with Multi year criteria are adjusted using all year‰Ûªs in the proration (and do not take the adjusted threshold into account)* Bonuses with multiple criteria will have the basic adjustment applied* Summary screen now displays offered adjusted bonus values and they match the values from the contract screen

title: As a Intl BOC Admin, I want to see a prior year column for each stat

title: As a Intl BOC Admin, I want to see if a player ended the season on the IL while reviewing the PIEF List
custom_preconds: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc]Data Discovery:[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789296/PIEF+List+-+Entry+Form|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789296/PIEF+List+-+Entry+Form]AC:* There will be a new "IL at EOS" column added to the PIEF List screen* The layout will match the provided wire and data discovery* This column will be populated with a green checkmark if the player was on the IL on the last day of the season for the Club he was assigned to** For example, if a player was on a DSL roster than ended on 8/25, and he was on the IL that day, he would have a green checkmark in this column* If the player was not on the IL on the last day of the season, this column will be blank

title: As a Intl BOC Admin, I want to see supporting columns for Plate Appearances and Innings Caught on the PIEF List
custom_preconds: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc]Data Discovery:[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789296/PIEF+List+-+Entry+Form|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789296/PIEF+List+-+Entry+Form]AC:* There will be four new columns added to the PIEF List:** yyyy LOP by Innings (prior year)** yyyy LOP by Innings (current year)** yyyy LOP by TPA (prior year)** yyyy LOP by TPA (current year)* These columns will follow the existing logic in the other LOP columns:** Calculated by the system based on the player's stats. If no stats found, set to Rookie. If stats are found more than one level of play, set to the highest level of play that the player reaches 50% of stats played for.Ex: If player played 20% of games at MJ level and 30% at AAA and 50% at AA, their LOP would be AAA becuase the 20 MJ and 30 AAA = 50%. Locks when form is moved to Reviewed status.* The columns in the widget will be rearranged to match the data discovery and wireNOTE: Please confirm we currently show Rookie when no stats are found

title: As a Intl BOC Admin, I want the Details column to be a conditional dropdown on the PIEF List
custom_preconds: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc]Data Discovery:AC:* When adding players to the PIEF List, Details will be a dropdown if either of the following values is selected as a Reason:** Physical Injury** Extreme Fatigue* If Physical Injury is selected, the Details dropdown will contain the following values:** 60 IL days / 15 in last 60 days of season** Ended season on IL** Surgery exemption* If Extreme Fatigue is selected, the Details dropdown will contain the following values:** Meets threshold** Workload increase exemption* If Club Exemption is selected, Details will remain a text box

title: PIEF List Should be Updated to ONLY include Regular Season stats from Affiliated Leagues
custom_preconds: Currently the PIEF List includes stats from the Mexican League and post season stats from affiliated leagues.It should only include regular season stats from affiliated leagues.  Users have offered to confirm the logic we use.

title: As a User, I want to send a SFD out for esign (Recert)
custom_preconds: Transactions:* IL RecertificationWires:[https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig|https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig]Reqs:[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786557/EBIS4-UC-3000+SFD+-+Disabled+List+Recertification|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786557/EBIS4-UC-3000+SFD+-+Disabled+List+Recertification]AC:* When completing one of the above transactions, there an esign button will appear users with MJ SFD ESIGN permission (Submitted state)* Clicking the esign button will allow the user to select Notice of Disposition or Standard Form of Diagnosis* Selecting Standard Form of Diagnosis will launch the modal in the provided wire* The doctor line of the modal will have a drop down populated with all the doctors included in the Club‰Ûªs doctor widget* Selecting a doctor will load the doctor's contact information from the widget* There will be an Add New Doctor link, as depicted in the wire** Clicking this link will redirect to the Doctors tab of the employee Dashboard* User will be able to select ‰Û÷In Person' or 'Email‰Ûª methods for the doctor* Doctor will be able to complete the following fields:** Estimated Time for Recovery** Comments** Physician Signature** Date* When doctor has completed esign process, the SFD will appear in the Club E-Signature widget under a new ‰Û÷SFD‰Ûª filter* Existing club stamping process will stamp:** Club Official Name** Club Official Signature** Date* Once esign process is complete, SFD will be attached to the transaction with ‰ÛÏStandard Form of Diagnosis‰Û� as a Label** This should check the Received SFD box

title: As a User, I want to send a SFD out for esign (Transfer to 60 Day IL)
custom_preconds: Transactions Covered:* Transfer to 10 Day IL* Transfer to 15 Day IL* Transfer to 60 Day ILWires:* [https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig|https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig]Reqs:* [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786559/EBIS4-UC-3002+SFD+-+Transfer+for+60+Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786559/EBIS4-UC-3002+SFD+-+Transfer+for+60+Day+DL]AC:* When completing one of the above transactions, there an esign button will appear users with MJ SFD ESIGN permission (Submitted state)* Clicking the esign button will allow the user to select Notice of Disposition or Standard Form of Diagnosis* Selecting Standard Form of Diagnosis will launch the modal in the provided wire* The doctor line of the modal will have a drop down populated with all the doctors included in the Club‰Ûªs doctor widget* Selecting a doctor will load the doctor's contact information from the widget* There will be an Add New Doctor link, as depicted in the wire** Clicking this link will redirect to the Doctors tab of the employee Dashboard* User will be able to select ‰Û÷In Person' or 'Email‰Ûª methods for the doctor* Doctor will be able to complete the following fields:** Estimated Time for Recovery** Physician Signature** Date (populated automatically)* When doctor has completed esign process, the SFD will appear in the Club E-Signature widget under a new ‰Û÷SFD‰Ûª filter* Existing club stamping process will stamp:** Club Official Name** Club Official Signature** Date* Once esign process is complete, SFD will be attached to the transaction with ‰ÛÏStandard Form of Diagnosis‰Û� as a Label** This should check the Received SFD box

title: As a User, I want to send a SFD out for esign (IL Placements)
custom_preconds: Transactions Covered:* Place on 10 Day IL* Place on 15 Day IL* Place on 60 Day ILWires:  [https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig|https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_sfd_for_email_e-sig][https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig|https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig]Reqs: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786560/EBIS4-UC-3001+SFD+-+Place+on+15+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786560/EBIS4-UC-3001+SFD+-+Place+on+15+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL|smart-link] AC:* When completing one of the above transactions, there an esign button will appear users with MJ SFD ESIGN permission (Submitted state)* Clicking the esign button will allow the user to select Notice of Disposition or Standard Form of Diagnosis* Selecting Standard Form of Diagnosis will launch the modal in the provided wire* The doctor line of the modal will have a drop down populated with all the doctors included in the Club‰Ûªs doctor widget* Selecting a doctor will load the doctor's contact information from the widget* There will be an Add New Doctor link, as depicted in the wire** Clicking this link will redirect to the Doctors tab of the employee Dashboard* User will be able to select ‰Û÷In Person' or 'Email‰Ûª methods for the doctor* Doctor will be able to complete the following fields:** Estimated Time for Recovery** Physician Signature** Date (populated by adobe)* When doctor has completed esign process, the SFD will appear in the Club E-Signature widget under a new ‰Û÷SFD‰Ûª filter* Existing club stamping process will stamp:** Club Official Name** Club Official Signature** Date* Once esign process is complete, SFD will be attached to the transaction with ‰ÛÏStandard Form of Diagnosis‰Û� as a Label** This should check the Received SFD box

title: As a User, I want player letter to print in both english and spanish for spanish speaking players
custom_preconds: INC0141822AC:* If a player has their language set to Spanish on their profile, player letters printed directly from the player will print in both English and Spanish* This applies to the following letters:‰Û¢	Consent of Transfer of Rehabilitation Form‰Û¢	Consent to Continue Rehab at ST Facility Beyond 20 Days‰Û¢	Letter To Potential MNFA‰Û¢	Minor League Life Insurance Form‰Û¢	Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers‰Û¢	Notice Player Five Plus Year MLS Optional Assignment‰Û¢	Notice Player Five Plus Year MLS Outright‰Û¢	Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release‰Û¢	Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League Contract‰Û¢	Notice to Player with 3 or more years MLS or second Outright‰Û¢	Notice to Player with Super 2 Status‰Û¢	SCAT5 Form

title: As a BI Representative, I want the Trade Checklist Crystal report updated
custom_preconds: Changes from Jeff.All of the testing.

title: As a User, I want Quick Search connected to Advanced Search
custom_preconds: *Value:*  Quick Search has filters built in to improve usage.  The ability to hit enter and complete an advanced search will help quickly find people that have fallen out of the quick search populations.*Wire:* [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=advanced_search_via_quick_search|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=advanced_search_via_quick_search]*AC:** There will be a footer row at the bottom of quick search results, as depicted in the wire** The text will say ‰ÛÏSearch more players with Advanced Search‰Û� if the search type is set to any of the player options** The text will say ‰ÛÏSearch more employees with Advanced Search‰Û� if the search type is set to employees* The footer row will have a link to Advanced Search* If a user clicks this link while using Quick Search, rather than selecting an option in the drop-down, they will be re-directed to Advance Search* The search type they had selected on Quick Search (Pro Player, Domestic Amateur, International Amateur, Employee) will be loaded as the search type* A Last Name filter will be loaded with anything typed to the left of the comma in Quick Search* A First Name filter will be loaded with anything typed to the right of the comma in Quick Search* If there is no comma, there will only be a Last Name filter added* The search will run once the page loads

title: As a User, I want to be able to search for players with a specific clause from the Contract Language widget
custom_preconds: Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=contract_language_widget|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=contract_language_widget]AC:* On the Contract Language widget, there will be a new 'Contracts' column added to the end of the widget* This column will display the number of contracts that contain the clause* The number of contracts will be a hyper link* Clicking the hyperlink will perform an advanced search and return the contracts that contain the clause** ContractID will need to be added as a filter on Advance Search* Users will be able to right-click and perform the search in a new tab/window* Club users should only see Contracts they have permission to see** Confirm Terms - MJ** Terms Accepted - MN** Completed - UEC

title: Service calc off by one day when player crosses 172 threshold
custom_steps: SF reported discrepancies for George Springer (https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=345403) and Ketel Marte (https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=363839). It looks like the day of the 172 rollover the rounding isn't working correctly (see slack for more info).
custom_expected:
Example for Springer:
starting MLS days: 166
Day 1(2.78, 3 rounded)-> MLS days: 168.78 -> rounds ups to 169 (5.169)
Day 2(5.56, 6 rounded)-> MLS days: 171.56 -> was previously rounding up to 172 here but we’re actually .44 away from 172 so this should calc to 6.000 on day 2(6.000)
Day 3(8.34, 8 rounded)-> Adjusted MLS days since rollover: (2.78, 3 rounded) (6.003)
Day 4(11.12, 11 rounded)-> Adjusted MLS days since rollover: (5.56, 6 rounded) (6.006)
Day 5(13.9, 14 rounded)-> Adjusted MLS days since rollover: (8.34, 8 rounded) (6.008)

title: INC0152422 - non-MLB users are  unable to email contracts
custom_steps: Since we changed to the Amazon SES gateway, users have been unable to email contracts as the domains are not verified.

title: Newly entered MJCs do not apply the adjusted calcs on the first time they are saved
custom_steps:
The actual/scheduled games are not loaded when a contract is created which means that adjusted values aren't correct on save of a prelim contract.  In general this isnt a problem, however now that threshold adj is calculated once and never again, its causing a problem.

The first time the contract is saved, it should also pull in the games adjustment and apply that to all values (in particular to any performance or other bonus thresholds)
